<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <script src="typed_js/typed.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
  <span class="typing"></span>

  <script type="text/javascript">
    var typed = new Typed('.typing',{
      strings: ["Student.", "Coder.", "Geek,", "Tech_Enthusiast.", "Mechatronics_Engineer."],
      loop: true,
      typeSpeed: 65,
      backSpeed: 65
    });
  </script>
</body>
</html>
